text: A young woman from Hong Kong has claimed that she was scammed into marrying a complete stranger in mainland China during a simulated wedding. The 21 - year - old woman, who has not been named, said she was told to play the role of a bride in a mock wedding in Fuzhou, Fujian province to complete her training to become a wedding planner. However, during the ceremony in June, she and a man of similar age signed a genuine marriage certificate at a local government office and were officially married. The young woman from Hong Kong ( centre ) has claimed that she was scammed into marrying a complete stranger in Fuzhou city, mainland China during a simulated wedding She only realised she had been tricked upon returning to Hong Kong, where a friend told her it was a marriage scam. Due to lack of evidence
